Entry.JapaneseText: 漆黒トリオといい、ドネルといい、この一年の 間に、<Blue>王の盾<White>の兵士も増えたみたいだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: It seems like the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> has enlisted a lot of soldiers this past year, like that Dark Trio or Donel.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>落日<White>の影響で、能力者が、 増えているせいだろう……
Entry.EnglishText: Probably because the number of Force users is increasing due to the <Blue>Dusk of Ladras<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: この先、色々と、俺たちの知らないフォルスを使う 能力者が出てくる可能性もある。
Entry.EnglishText: In the future, it's possible we will meet other users of Force who are unknown to us.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、今のところヘンなのが多いけど、 油断は禁物だネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, we've had a lot of odd encounters as of late, so we best stay on our guard!
